data.text:
I'm still not receiving this email with pdf. Testing on dev.lawdata.co.za

Steps:
Create company on CC
Add Branch and account person
Add user and set role to Admin

Is this process correct for testing? Is this when the email should be sent?
Or do I have to do a full registration then enable the company on dev? Will  doing a registration on UAT, create the company on dev?

@lungisaximbi @jakovanrensburg
